condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec I. Para 2 (a) | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementation Entity tocarry out the Project in accordance with the Finance Procedures and Accounting Manual, both satisfactory to the Association. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec I. Para 2 (b) | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementation Entity notlater than three months after the effectiveness of this Agreement to adopt a Procurement Manual, which with regard to theprocurement to be financed by the Association, shall be satisfactory to the Association, and to carry out the Project in accordancewith such Manual. | Due Date :31-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec I. Para 2 (c) | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementation Entity not toamend, abrogate, suspend or waive any provision of the said Procedures and Manuals without the prior written agreement of theAssociation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec II. Para A. 1 | Description :The Recipient shall cause the EEP to monitor and evaluate theprogress of the Project and prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.08 of the General Conditions andon the basis of the indicators acceptable to the Association. Each Project Report shall cover the period of 6 months and shall befurnished to the Association not later than 45 days after end of period. | Frequency :Semi Annual

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec II. Para A. 2 | Description :The report on the execution of the Project and related planrequired pursuant to that Section shall be furnished to the Association not later than six (6) months after the closing date. | DueDate :30-Jun-2020

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec II. Para B. 2 | Description :The Recipient shall maintain or cause the Project ImplementingEntity to prepare and furnish to the Association not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter,interim unaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. |Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Sec II. Para B. 3 | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementation Entity to haveits Financial Statements and the Financial Statements related to the Project audited in accordance with the General Conditions. Theaudited Financial Statements for each such period shall be furnished to the Association not later than six (6) months after the endof such period. | Frequency :Yearly
